text:
Processing DataSource additions through the admin application creates 
incomplete ResourceParams element.  The parameter with name 'factory' and value 
of 'org.apache.commons.dbcp.BasicDataSourceFactory' is not part of the element.
creator: phlat@mindspring.com
remm@apache.org
text:
'org.apache.commons.dbcp.BasicDataSourceFactory' is the default value for data
sources, so it is supposed to work like that.

creator: phlat@mindspring.com
text: Sorry for my confusion on this.
